Class NewURLyBirdHotelDialog

java.lang.Object

                  javax.swing.JDialog
                      suncertify.gui.NewURLyBirdHotelDialog
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public abstract class NewURLyBirdHotelDialog
extends javax.swing.JDialog

This abstract class extends the JDialog class It draws to the user interface required components thats Dialog needs to create a new URLyBirdHotel record which will be added to the Database

Author:
Segun
See Also:
Serialized Form

Method Detail

add

public abstract void add()
Override this abstract method in child class to provide instructions to be executed when the okButton on the GUI is clicked this function calls the getValue() of this class perform the adding of new URLyBirdHotel to the database

cancel

public abstract void cancel()
Override this abstract method in child class to provide instructions to be executed when the cancelButton on the GUI is clicked

getValues

public java.lang.String[] getValues()
                             throws java.lang.NumberFormatException,
                                    URLyBirdException
Reads all filled Data from the User Interface VALIDATE IT and gets the values in form of array of String length 7 which each index represents a field in the database

Returns:
String[] of data filled via the UI
Throws:
java.lang.NumberFormatException - if price value provided cannot be converted to a Double value or any of either, day, month, or year value cannot be converted to an integer value
URLyBirdException - if any of the field required is left empty
